trends.title: YouTube will soon let creators make Shorts with their own AI likeness
trends.summary: YouTube Shorts viewers might soon see AI versions of their favorite creators when scrolling through their feeds.

trends.title: OpenAI aims to ship its first device in 2026, and it could be earbuds
trends.summary: The AI startup is on track to announce its first hardware device in the second half of this year, OpenAI Chief Global Affairs Officer Chris Lehane said during an interview at Davos.

trends.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 tickets now on sale: Lowest rates all year
trends.summary: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 tickets are officially on sale. Save up to $680 on your ticket and be among the first 500 registrants to score a plus-one pass at 50% off. Don't miss 10,000 tech leaders, founders, and VCs in San Francisco from October 13-15. Register before these one-time deals vanish.

trends.title: Language learning marketplace Preply’s unicorn status embodies Ukrainian resilience
trends.summary: Language learning marketplace Preply is now valued at $1.2 billion after raising a $150 million Series D round that marks a new chapter for the 14-year-old company.

trends.title: Consumers spent more on mobile apps than games in 2025, driven by AI app adoption
trends.summary: Consumers spent more money in mobile apps than games in 2025, driven by AI app adoption.

trends.title: In an effort to protect young users, ChatGPT will now predict how old you are
trends.summary: The feature is designed to stop problematic content from being delivered to users under the age of 18.

trends.title: Generative AI tool helps 3D print personal items that sustain daily use
trends.summary: “MechStyle” allows users to personalize 3D models, while ensuring they’re physically viable after fabrication, producing unique personal items and assistive technology.

trends.title: 3 Questions: How AI could optimize the power grid
trends.summary: While the growing energy demands of AI are worrying, some techniques can also help make power grids cleaner and more efficient.

trends.title: MIT scientists investigate memorization risk in the age of clinical AI
trends.summary: New research demonstrates how AI models can be tested to ensure they don’t cause harm by revealing anonymized patient health data.

trends.title: Guided learning lets “untrainable” neural networks realize their potential
trends.summary: CSAIL researchers find even “untrainable” neural nets can learn effectively when guided by another network’s built-in biases using their guidance method.

trends.title: Adobe Acrobat now lets you edit files using prompts, generate podcast summaries
trends.summary: Adobe is adding AI tools to Acrobat, including the ability to generate podcast summaries of files, create presentations, and a way for users to edit files using prompts.

trends.title: Zanskar thinks 1 TW of geothermal power is being overlooked
trends.summary: Zanskar has raised $115 million to find about a dozen geothermal resources that could help power the grid throughout the U.S. West.

trends.title: Bolna nabs $6.3M from General Catalyst for its India-focused voice orchestration platform
trends.summary: Bolna said that 75% of its revenue is coming from self-serve customers.

trends.title: Anthropic’s CEO stuns Davos with Nvidia criticism
trends.summary: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei unloaded on both the administration and U.S. chip companies over plans to sell to China. The criticism was particularly notable because one of those chipmakers, Nvidia, is a major partner and investor in Anthropic.

trends.title: Why it’s critical to move beyond overly aggregated machine-learning metrics
trends.summary: New research detects hidden evidence of mistaken correlations — and provides a method to improve accuracy.

trends.title: At MIT, a continued commitment to understanding intelligence
trends.summary: With support from the Siegel Family Endowment, the newly renamed MIT Siegel Family Quest for Intelligence investigates how brains produce intelligence and how it can be replicated to solve problems.

trends.title: Decoding the Arctic to predict winter weather
trends.summary: With the help of AI, MIT Research Scientist Judah Cohen is reshaping subseasonal forecasting, with the goal of extending the lead time for predicting impactful weather.

trends.title: Stone Center on Inequality and Shaping the Future of Work Launches at MIT
trends.summary: Recent launch event for the center featured discussions on pro-worker AI, wealth inequality, and the future of liberal democracy.

trends.title: Using design to interpret the past and envision the future
trends.summary: MIT graduate student C Jacob Payne reimagines historic architecture and invents new possibilities at the intersection of AI and design.

trends.title: MIT in the media: 2025 in review
trends.summary: MIT community members made headlines with key research advances and their efforts to tackle pressing challenges.
